import re

def get_sorted_words(string):
    string = re.sub('', '', string)
    words = string.upper().split()
    sorted_words = sorted(words)
    return sorted_words

import re

def get_sorted_words(string):
    string = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', string)
    words = string.upper().split()
    sorted_words = sorted(words)
    return sorted_words
